#summary How to install WordCram (it's not hard)

= Introduction =

!WordCram installs like any normal Processing library -- just download, unzip, and copy it into the "libraries" folder.

= Details =

  # Make sure you have Processing installed and working on your computer -- version 1.0 or greater should be fine.
  # [http://code.google.com/p/wordcram/downloads/list Download] and unzip !WordCram.
  # Open your Processing sketchbook folder, where all your sketches are saved.
    * _If you don't know where your Processing sketchbook folder is, open Processing, and in File > Preferences, look for "Sketchbook folder"._
  # In your Processing sketchbook folder, there should be a folder named libraries.  Copy the !WordCram folder into it.
  # Restart Processing.

!WordCram is now installed.

= Running a Sample !WordCram =

  # In Processing, open File > Sketchbook > libraries > !WordCram, and run any of the sketches under "tutorial" or "examples".
